product_name: Surftech Saber Blacktip Stand Up Paddleboard - 11' 6"
long_description: This intermediate-level stand up paddleboard has a sleek bow and a narrow shape that carve through rough waters as well as move efficiently through flatwater on longer paddles.
short_description: This intermediate-level stand up paddleboard has a sleek bow and a narrow shape that carve through rough waters as well as move efficiently through flatwater on longer paddles.
